description: We look at how to paint the Witches of Dathomir, adding a splash of color and intrigue to your Shatterpoint forces.
title: How to Paint Everything: Star Wars Shatterpoint Witches of Dathomir Squad Pack

description: We take a look at some of the top news stories of the past week in the gaming industry.
title: Games Industry News Roundup- November 5th, 2024

description: With the arrival of the October 2024 balance update which winds back the glow-up Old Dominion received in January from ‘near-nuclear’ to ‘merely incandescent’, the Conquest Faction Focus for the Old Dominion has been thoroughly updated, with new sections, revised entries for many units, and new sample armies. The Old Dominion remain a very strong […]
title: Updated Article – Conquest Faction Focus: The Old Dominion – November 2024

description: Let's see what the team has been up to in the lead up to to the end of the year.
title: Goonhammer Hobby Round-Up: October 2024

description: We talk about the Lifeleech Mechanic in the new edition of Kings of War.
title: Lifeleech Sucks in Kings of War

description: We take a deep dive into the characters of the Secrets and Whispers set for the Song of Ice and Fire Miniatures Game.
title: ASOIAF: Tactics Neutrals Part Three – Secrets and Whispers

description: Add-ons are plentiful in this update for Administratum! We've made a bunch of updates to Administratum. Come check them out, and listen to our plans for the next three weeks.
title: Administratum – Orks and Skeletons – A Match Made in the War in Heaven?

description: For today’s How to Paint Everything we are covering Ursa Major, the massive bear of the Winter Guard. Mikhail Uriokovitch, is a mutant hailing from the former Soviet Union and has been both a foe and ally of various Marvel heroes over the years. In terms of Marvel: Crisis Protocol, he is a member of […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Ursa Major
